title: Ep. 331 - A History Of Violence
description:
The Left is crying crocodile tears over fake incitements to violence. Meanwhile, leftists repeatedly commit actual violence against conservatives, including little ol’ me during a campus lecture last Thursday! We will expose the Left’s sham grievance games from Ilhan Omar to Nancy Pelosi. Date: 04-15-2019
